project.name: samantha
project.title: Samantha
project.description: Engine 3 is the third iteration of the Samantha Engine. Samantha engine is the core and the framework of what an assistant interface might be like. its design is modular so it's easy to add functionality to the framework.
project.short_description: is a natural language intelligent digital assistant.

project.name: spaceverse
project.title: SpaceVerse
project.description: SpaceVerse is an app for productivity. A place where you can focus on your task at hand while you travel around the world on your own desk. It's still on its early stages and is still under development.
project.short_description: is an app for productivity while you travel around the world.

properties.title: Tech-Stack
properties.value: React, Redux, Node, MongoDB, Express, Socket.io

project.name: atlas
project.title: Atlas
project.description: is a digital chatbot that can answer questions about the given restaurant and order food through it.
project.short_description: is a restaurant chatbot. You can ask questions about the restaurant.
